title: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
tagline: Silky, cheesy, actually tastes like broccoli
ingredients: 2 lbs broccoli, florets chopped, stems sliced thin
steps: Melt butter in Dutch oven over medium-high. Add broccoli, onion, garlic, mustard, cayenne, and salt. Cook 6 minutes.
Add 1 cup water and baking soda. Cover, simmer 20 minutes until broccoli is very soft.
Add broth and 2 cups water. When simmering, add spinach, cook 1 minute.
Blend in batches with cheeses until smooth.
Return to pot, simmer. Adjust consistency with water. Season to taste.
notes: Baking soda speeds breakdown for sweeter flavor.
Overcooking broccoli is actually the key here.
Don't boil after adding cheese or it separates.
